default.name: Pohjois-Suomen Islamilainen Yhdyskunta (PSIY)
default.description: PSIY is the local central mosque of Oulu, that runs religious and social activities as well as education training, well fit sports & recreation. We also hold learning sessions for the children, advisory sessions for the local community.
default.about:
The Islamic Society of Northern Finland was registered in 2000, but Islamic activities began in the 90s. Our actions are a response to the call of Allah SWT(Subhanahu wata`ala): "and that you may become a congregation that calls people to goodness, guides them to the right way of life, and prevents them from evil" (Surah Al-Imran: verse 104).
The goal of the organization is to please Allah (SWT) by striving to promote Islam, develop the Muslim community and benefit society. The organization always follows the Qur'an and the Sunnah (Prophets teaching), along with the Islamic Sharia, when making decisions and drawing up policies and procedures.

We are based in Oulu, Northern Ostrobothnia, Finland.

content_sections.title: Oulu Central Mosque
content_sections.subtitle: Yusuf Naaghi Masjid Oulu
content_sections.body:
[Linnankatu 23-25, 90100 Oulu](https://goo.gl/maps/tup6JDF7UQE3M3LN8)

Jummah times 
- Winter - 12:30 pm
- Summer - 1:30 pm

[Download](../JUNE-2023-OULU.pdf) this months prayer timetable.

content_sections.title: News
content_sections.body: - [21.6.2023 23.37] **Eid ul Adha will on 28th June 2023. The prayer would be at 9 am, Rajakylä School (Riskukkatie 4-6, 90580, Oulu), GATE E.**

content_sections.title: Services
content_sections.body:
- PSIY has the license for making Nikah as per Islamic shariah law.
- It also takes care of the funeral activities for the deceased Muslim members.
- It can arrange seminars and exhibitions to introduce Islam to the local Finnish people.
- It collaborates with the Oulu City council, Oulu Church authority, and other religious ogranizations for integration.

content_sections.title: Resources
content_sections.subtitle: Membership Applications
content_sections.body:
- [Joining a religious community](https://dvv.fi/documents/16079645/20465665/Ilmoitus+uskonnolliseen+yhdyskuntaan+liittymisest%C3%A4/c3e44fb3-bb4f-1602-2963-98e0c3aef949/Ilmoitus+uskonnolliseen+yhdyskuntaan+liittymisest%C3%A4.pdf?t=1636468411778)
- [Consent of a 12-17-year-old to join/leave a religious denomination](https://dvv.fi/documents/16079645/20465665/12-17+vuotiaan+henkil%C3%B6n+suostumus+uskonnolliseen+yhdyskuntaan+liittymiseen-uskonnollisesta+yhdyskunnasta+eroamiseen/cbbf43a9-941e-7d06-202a-53d6e0935f23/12-17+vuotiaan+henkil%C3%B6n+suostumus+uskonnolliseen+yhdyskuntaan+liittymiseen-uskonnollisesta+yhdyskunnasta+eroamiseen.pdf?t=1673864183400)
- [Consent of the guardians of a 15-17-year-old to join/leave a religious community](https://dvv.fi/documents/16079645/20465665/Huoltajien+suostumus+15-17-vuotiaan+henkil%C3%B6n+uskonnolliseen+yhdyskuntaan+liittymiseen+tai+yhdyskunnasta+eroamiseen/ddbddc8d-286c-36c4-2d1d-de06f1615777/Huoltajien+suostumus+15-17-vuotiaan+henkil%C3%B6n+uskonnolliseen+yhdyskuntaan+liittymiseen+tai+yhdyskunnasta+eroamiseen.pdf?t=1673864153458)

To join the association, fill out the membership application and the appropriate VRK forms found in the links above. The completed documents must be duly signed and brought to the masjid office. Once the board or the imam approves the petition, the VRK form will be sent to the appropriate authority.

default.donation.description: Your contribution will help us to maintain and develop the wide range of services we offer. Prophet Muhammad ﷺ said: “Allah said: ‘Spend, O son of Adam, and I shall spend on you.’”.
